text: Oliver Villadsen (born 16 November 2001), is a Danish professional soccer player who plays as a central defender for Nordsjælland.https://fcn.dk/employee/oliver-villadsen/ ==Career== ===FC Nordsjælland=== Villadsen started playing football when he was 2,5-years old. At the age of 10, Villadsen started playing football in Blovstrød IF, where his dad was the coach. He was then scoutet by FC Nordsjælland. He went to trials but although, he decided to join Slangerup OIF instead so he could be 100% prepared. In 2010 he then joined Nordsjælland.Fokus på: Oliver Villadsen, FCN – Det bedste job man kan have, dbold.dk, 19 December 2016 In October 2017, just a year after signing his first contract with FC Nordsjælland on his 15-year birthday, Villadsen signed a new three-year contract.FCN forlænger med U17-landsholdsspiller, tonsser.com, 17 October 2017 In the summer 2019, Villadsen was permanently promoted into the first team squad at the age of 17. He also penned a new three-year professional contract with the club.Oliver Villadsen har forlænget kontrakt med FC Nordsjælland, holdnyt.dk, 25 July 2019 On 11 August 2019, Villadsen got his official debut for FC Nordsjælland against Silkeborg IF in the Danish Superliga, playing the last 15 minutes of the game. ==References== ==External links== * *Oliver Villadsen at DBU *Oliver Villadsen at FCN's website Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Danish footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Nordsjælland players Category:Danish Superliga players Category:Denmark youth international footballers
title: Oliver Villadsen
